testcase.classname: To validate the log in functionality of the ICICI Bank web Application
testcase.name: To validate the log in page with valid userid and password
testcase.system-out: When user has to pass the url of the ICICI bank.............................passed And user has to pass the valid data in the user id textbox..................passed And user has to click the arrow button......................................passed And user has to pass the valid data in the password textbox.................passed And user has to click the log in button and print the message...............passed Then user has to check the credentials are valid or not.....................passed
